successes.title: Smart Herb Garden by Click & Grow
successes.description: High technology meets your house plants. This smart garden lets everyone grow fresh herbs at home.

Pledges.description: A BIG THANK YOU. Every little helps. You'll get our project updates, experiencing our good days as well as the bad days.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL. Get the Smart Herb Garden for just $29 and receive one of the first shipped units - because you're quick and awesome
SMART HERB GARDEN. Ready to use and includes 3 plant cartridges: basil, thyme and lemon balm. Cooking will never be the same! (This is more than 40% off the retail price we're currently planning)
SMART HERB GARDEN - KIWI GREEN LID. Ready to use and includes 3 plant cartridges: basil, thyme and lemon balm. (More than 40% off the retail price we're currently planning)
SMART HERB GARDEN - SOFT PINK LID. Ready to use and includes 3 plant cartridges: basil, thyme and lemon balm. (More than 40% off the retail price we're currently planning)
SMART HERB GARDEN - ORANGE LID. Ready to use and includes 3 plant cartridges: basil, thyme and lemon balm. (More than 40% off the retail price we're currently planning)

SMART HERB GARDEN - BLACK KICKSTARTER SPECIAL EDITION. Matte black finish only available to Kickstarter supporters. Comes with 3 plant cartridges: basil, thyme and lemon balm. Serial numbers engraved on the device in order of making Kickstarter pledges.

CLASSIC WHITE + GREEN LID COMBO. Get two of our most popular herb gardens and grow even more herbs, or give one to a friend. Comes with 3 plant cartridges (basil, thyme and lemon balm) for both of them, plus the stretch goal refills.
SMART HERB GARDEN + 9 REFILLS. Choose color of lid (white, green or red) when the project gets funded. Extra refills such as mini tomato, chili pepper and others should last over a year.

SMART HERB GARDEN + 2-YEAR SUBSCRIPTION FOR REFILLS. Pick any smart herb garden (including the Kickstarter Special edition) and get 3 refills sent to you every quarter for two years. Extra refills to include mini tomato, chili pepper and some truly exclusive plants. Also, you'll be our hero.
Available in US and EU only.
INTERACTIVE NEXT GEN SMART HERB GARDEN. Stroke or hug the plants to get feedback whether they have enough water, or just say HI back to you. Hand made and pretty darn cool.
